channel.title: Tidymodels on DNA confesses Data speak

item.title: How to use random forest as a clustering method
item.description: If you ask me: what’s your favorite machine learning algorithm? I would answer logistic regression (with regularization: Lasso, Ridge and Elastic) followed by random forest. In fact, that’s how we try those methods in order. Deep learning can perform well for tabular data with complicated architecture while random forest or boost tree based method usually work well out of the box. Regression and random forest are more interpretable too.
